title: looking4answersbtc
author: looking4answersbtc
created_time: January 13, 2025, 12:21:36 AMLast edit: February 12, 2025, 11:59:31 PM by looking4answersbtc
content: Hello all, I'm looking for answer since I've found someone claiming to be SATOSHI NAKAMOTO.Is name is James Vertisan and he claim to be working on a new crypto ecosystem.Link: Twitter: @xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxÂ youtube: The Satoshi Sessions @xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxHis whitepaper : xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxWebsite: xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxhttps://xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx (link to the telegram group at the end of the website)He claim to be signing with the PGP key but I dont know how to verify itCould just be another honeypot (most likely ) he's still pretty convincing on his telegram chanel with 500 People but I have resonable doubt about it. What do you think ?

comments.author: rodskee
comments.body: i do not need to click on the links and analyze his account to know he is lying people fall victim to this kind of scams all the time the fact that you are second guessing this means you are still vulnerable to falling for schemes like this i believe if he really is satoshi he will be able to do just one thing that could convince the entire world that he is indeed satoshiinstead he is in telegram trying to convince 500 people lol do not waste time on people like this and stop trying to find satoshi and just focus on yourself and satoshi's creation and that is bitcoin his presence will not change anything in the bitcoin network anyway and he will not give you free bitcoins if you ever actually find him

comments.author: looking4answersbtc
comments.body: So I have digged more inside this scam and ho boy there a lot to talk about, He strated as a glof app developper (Executive Caddie) and then sell it for a good profit to microsoft, the man is just a washed out poker player who got jumped and now try to sell his shitcoin to everyone pretending to be the true Satoshi with 25000h of solo codingtheir telegram is loaded with follwer all sucking him and praising him, everyone who ask too musch quesion are banned. all the deadline are not respected and where pushed further into "soon I promise !" ther is nothing but a website, not a single line of code was shown during 1 year, I've found some obscure reddit thread where he ask for help with his 5000h of work and just get laughed atsome people manage do cash out but sommehow the price didnt change even 0.0001$the admin have access to your wallet and can make the transfer themselve I manage to talk to some old memeber and they all have this feeling of a sect with the cult leader I also have his full name and the name of his friends but you dont realy need this to avoid this cheap scam. Stay safe boys !

comments.author: apogio
comments.body: Quote from: looking4answersbtc on January 28, 2025, 12:05:43 AMSo I have digged more inside this scam and ho boy there a lot to talk about, <...>Stay safe boys ! There is nothing to talk about when something is proven to be a scam.Thanks for the warning, but I 'd ask you to lock the thread and remove the links.Satoshi won't be revealed. Ever!

comments.author: looking4answersbtc
comments.body: Careful everyone, If you're here then your looking for answers and the truth is that James Vertisan is NOT Satoshi Nakamoto :- he use a fake PGP key backdated to 2008, it's his third scam already with Nebula and Vertisan Coin. - his true name is James Browning, he became rich simply selling his shitty golf app to the widows phone and now he's showing-off like he's satoshi- he claim to have 25000h and 12 years of work but he will never show a single line of code (because it's not real outside his fake HTML website)- when selling was still available admin had full acces to your "fake wallet" and could send or close it as they wanted- he claim to have made a full autonomous AI bot to protect the "fractal network" but cant even put in place a chatbot- the VTSN price is just a bad joke, he enter the price randomly and selling or buying wont change it ( "i'm working on an uppdate soon" )- the telegram group with 500 user are mostly fake bot and people that are muted or his alt accounts - the honeypot is real, he locked up the trade possibility, it was suposed to go live on 3rd January then 2nd Feb then "ready in 2/3 days max" and now radio silenceif you had invested in this scam or want more info feel free to contact me at Twitter @LookinanswerStay safe#Vertisan #VTSN#James Vertisan#Cryptocase#swapVTSN
